verses.roman:
anuvāda nā kahiyā nā kahi vidheya
āge anuvāda kahi, paścād vidheya

synonyms: anuvāda—the subject; nā kahiyā—not saying; nā—not; kahi—I say; vidheya—the predicate; āge—first; anuvāda—the subject; kahi—I say; paścāt—afterwards; vidheya—the predicate.
translation: "If I do not state a subject, I do not state a predicate. First I speak the former and then I speak the latter.
